# Ideas page for the Google Summer of Code (GSoC) 2011

= Introduction =

The Tonatiuh project is applying this year, for the first time, to the Google Summer of Code program. As it is stated in the [http://www.google-melange.com/ Google Summer of Code 2011 site], _Google Summer of Code (GSoC) is a global program that offers student developers stipends to write code for various open source software projects._

If you are a student developer and you are interested in participating in the GSoC program with the Tonatiuh project, please, get in contact with us after reading the information contained in this page and in the links it refers to.

To get acquainted with the GSoC program, please, read:

  * [http://code.google.com/soc/ General information about the GSoC program]
  * [http://www.google-melange.com/document/show/gsoc_program/google/gsoc2011/timeline GSoC programm timeline]
  * [http://www.booki.cc/gsocstudentguide/ The student guide to GSoC]

= Requirements to participate in GSoC with Tonatiuh =

If you plan to participate in the GSoC with Tonatiuh, please, note that you have to comply with the following requirements:

 * Be able to work full-time in your student project for the full duration of 12 weeks.
